p: The average annual number of cases diagnosed with febrile seizures was 69,766 (95% confidence interval [CI]: 64,397â€“75,135). The highest annual number of febrile seizure records was recorded in 2012 (80,643, 14.4%), while the lowest frequency was recorded in 2011 (59,554, 10.7%) ( Table 1). Because the HIRA database covers the entire Korean population, we calculated the annual incidence of febrile seizure according to the average population of Korean children younger than 6 years. This number was 2,749,488 (1,414,696 for boys and 1,334,792 for girls). The annual incidence of febrile seizure was calculated as 25.4 per 1000 person-years (27.9 for boys and 22.7 for girls).
